title: Burned Alive
content:
provides the desired Equipment Feature.

Burned Alive Information

Deals an aditional 1d4 Piercing damage to Burning targets.

Equipment that provides Burned Alive

Firestoker Dragon's Grasp

Burned Alive Tips & Notes
